text:
In this case:
<x:transform xml="${xmlDoc}" xslt="Activity.xsl" />
where xmlDoc is a variable exported by x:parse the following exception is 
thrown:

1) Do we need to specify a System id
2) Activity.xsl is in the same directory as the JSP
3) in case the attribute value to xslt is an object exported by x:parse it 
works fine
=======================================================================javax.ser

creator: prasad.subramanian@sun.com
bayern@essentially.net
text: Per PFD spec, you can't pass a URL to the 'xslt' attribute.
